title: Katie Price and Kris Boyson 'agree to open relationship' as she 'has insatiable appetite for sex'
text:

Katie Price and Kris Boyson have reportedly agreed that they can have sexual relations with other people.

The former glamour model, 41, and personal trainer, 30, who recently reconciled after she enjoyed a fling with toyboy Charles Drury, 22, are said to have chosen to embark on an open relationship as a result of the mother-of-five's "insatiable appetite for sex."

A source told Heat magazine that Kris has been understanding and is "not expecting Katie to be fully committed" and knows that she wants to "have fun outside the relationship" but he has asked her to be "honest with him."

The inside added: "She’s had to be honest and tell Kris she has an insatiable appetite for sex that often gets her in trouble.”

"They’ve agreed to an open relationship, although it is geared towards letting Katie do what she wants."

(Image: Instagram)

People close to Katie and Kris are said to be "horrified" by their sexually non-monogamous relationship after hoping Kris would be a "positive influence" on the busty beauty but instead fear he is "enabling her to make the same mistakes."

Mirror Online have contacted representatives for Katie and Kris for comment.

News of Katie and Kris' saucy arrangement comes after Kris blasted Katie with a scorching comeback after she claimed all her exes made money off her.

The personal trainer was not standing for it when Katie uploaded a clip from her YouTube channel, onto her Instagram account on Sunday, where she was seen having her hair styled and chatting to stylist Mel about her former flames.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

(Image: Instagram)

"I wanted to do this test Mel, on looking at my exes, who they were before they met me and what they did. So now, they’re not with me and the difference of their lives," she began.

"They have become Mr Price’s, tried to be famous, end up getting Instagram posts off the back of me, getting all jobs from me and being able to earn money from stories and all that with always mentioning my name."

Katie's clip did not sit well with Kris, who took to the comments with a scorching comeback, where he defended himself as a "respectful gentleman" who would "never become a Mr Price".

He typed, for her 2.1 million followers to see: "Don’t test me mate! I’m a respectful Gentleman! I do the same job I’ve done since before I met ya. I done TV before I met ya."

He continued: "I ain’t done paid Instagram posts, I ain’t sold stories, ain’t tried becoming a model and I’d never become a Mr Price thanks. I’ll always be a Boyson!"

Katie was quick to respond to Kris and backtrack by saying it was about her "ex husbands" - Peter Andre, Alex Reid and Kieran Hayler.

She explained: "@krisboyson it was the ex husbands as they all had absolutely nothing at all when I met them but you my darling are perfect."
description: The on and off again couple have reportedly agreed to a more adventurous agreement
